mapper.insert: insert into ksight_photo (email, photo_url, photo_sight, photonum, photo_size) values (#{email}, #{photo_url}, #{photo_sight}, ksight_photo_photonum_seq.nextval, #{photo_size})
mapper.select: select p.*, m.id from ksight_photo p, ksight_member m where p.email=m.email and photo_sight=#{sightname} order by photonum
select sightname, photo_url from ksight K, ksight_photo P where k.sightname=p.photo_sight and k.title=#{maintitle} order by upload_date
